DOC.brief_title: A Phase 1 , Dose-Escalation Trial PT2385 Tablets In Patients With Advanced Clear Cell Renal Cell Carcinoma
DOC.detailed_description: PART 1 : This Phase 1 , multiple-dose , dose-escalation trial PT2385 Tablets , patient advance ccRCC assign sequential dose cohort . Blood obtain analysis concentration PT2385 ass biomarkers . PART 2 : This Phase 1 trial PT2385 Tablets combination nivolumab , patient advance ccRCC assign dose cohort .
